commit_message:
docs: update skill counts after removing deprecated skills

- Change skill count from "21 active, 2 deprecated" to "21 total"
- Remove deprecated skills section (skill-tester and skilltest)
- Update directory structure to reflect 21 skills
- Note ENABLE_TOOL_SEARCH=auto in settings.json comment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

2. Determine which documentation files need updating
3. Update the relevant docs to reflect the changes
